name: The Curse of Illmoore Bay
description:
Nick Nettles, a Woodsboro Mall employee, discovers the legendary book of Wicked Carols. The book is said to be a guide to raise the spirits of the dark djinn, and with the holiday season soon approaching, Nick wasted no time. "I'm sick of playing Santa year after year!" he decried.

As he chanted the mystical words inscribed on the parchments before him, the calm night started turning into a whirlwind of chaos...

Only the protectors of Illmoore can stop the curse from having an everlasting effect on the quaint town of Illmoore Bay.

Game Features:
  • 6 worlds to explore with a total of 18 unique levels
  • Unique boss fights for each world
  • In game achievements
  • Unlockable Boss Rush mode
  • 3 playable characters to choose from
  • Unlockable powers
  • Upgradable abilities found in secret locations
  • A world map to show your progression and to revisit already beaten stages
  • a fun platforming adventure for all ages!
